meanings.definition: A person who plays the harpsichord.
meanings.sent1: The talented harpsichordists performed a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent2: The harpsichordists practiced diligently for their upcoming concert.
meanings.sent3: The harpsichordists decided to start a band with only harpsichord music.
meanings.sent4: In the orchestra of life, the harpsichordists add a unique rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The audience was mesmerized by the skill of the harpsichordists.

meanings.sent1: The group of harpsichordists played in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent2: Many harpsichordists gathered for a convention to share their passion.
meanings.sent3: The town celebrated the day of the harpsichordists with a grand parade.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with the sound of chirping birds, like a choir of harpsichordists.
meanings.sent5: The competition showcased the diverse styles of the talented harpsichordists.
